version_description:
• Redesigned user interface that is easier and more intuitive to navigate.
• Improved text-to-speech functionality.
• In-app device activation enables you to manage your devices from within the app.

• New! Updated library interface streamlines the organization of your content.
• New! Simplified library and book content search.
• New! Updated book information cards.

• New! Adds the ability for users to create custom flashcards on their phone or tablet.
• Other miscellaneous bug fixes.

• New! Make and study flashcards with images.
• Corrects an issue that may cause flashcards created while offline to fail to sync after connecting to the internet.
• Fixes an issue that causes the back/forward navigation arrows to disappear on iOS 13.
• Other miscellaneous bug fixes.

• New! Create new and edit existing highlighters on your device.
• New! Turn on fast highlighting and drag your finger over the text to highlight.
• Refreshed highlighter menu.
• Other miscellaneous bug fixes.
Fixes an issue that prevents some text entry fields from being visible when device settings have Increase Contrast enabled.
